name: worst

A2 superlative of
bad : of the lowest quality, or the most unpleasant, difficult, or severe: the worst That was the worst meal I've ever eaten. "It was the worst moment of my life," she admitted.worst enemy He is my worst enemy.
More examplesFewer examplesThe newspaper commissioned a series of articles on the worst excesses of the fashion industry.He's his own worst critic .This is one of the worst natural disasters ever to befall the area.The government's economic policies have led us into the worst recession for years.I'm not exaggerating - it was the worst meal I've ever eaten in my life.
